definition[0]: a vehicle or other object that is sleek has a smooth attractive shape
example[0]: the sleek lines of the new Mercedes
definition[1]: sleek hair or fur is straight, shiny, and healthy-looking
definition[2]: someone who is sleek looks rich and is well dressed
definition[3]: to make hair or fur smooth and shiny by putting water or oil on it
example[1]: His hair was sleeked back with oil.
